aboutDescription:
Recruit your squad and score {{amount}} per friend - like a heist, but without the FBI chase. Plus, earn up to 25% commission on their wagers. The best part? Your commission rate grows with you as you level up, and you'll even earn from your crew's recruits!

The bigger your network, the fatter your cut. Whether they win, lose, or bet like maniacs, you keep stacking cash. Time to build your empire - Start recruiting now!
gatherYourCrewDescription: As your crew levels up, the rewards start spilling out. Slow at first, then bam - the vault's open, and you're all cashing in.
crackTheVaultDescription: As your crew levels up, the rewards start spilling out. Slow at first, then bam - the vault's open, and you're all cashing in.
yourIndirectCommissionIsBasedOnTwoKeyFac: Your indirect commission is based on two key factors
theLevelOfReferrersBetweenYouAndThePlaye: The level of referrers between you and the player.
calculatorDescription:
The highest referrer between you and the player takes their commission first based on their VIP level. If there's any leftover, it goes to you.

Want to keep more? Level up and stay ahead!
shareDescription: Out of friends? Time to recruit! Tap the button to tell a total stranger about us on WhatsApp.
assembleACrewWith100M: Assemble a crew with {{amount}} in total wagers, and we'll hand you the keys to your very own casino. That's right—your own domain, custom design, and personalized branding. No more just playing the game—you run the show!
startRecruitingNow: Start recruiting now and claim your casino today!
commissionIsSharedOnlyWithYourDirectRefe: Commission is shared only with your direct referrals.
calculatorDirectDescription: Your VIP level not only gives you bragging rights—it also sets the commission rate you earn from your referrals' game play.
rulesTips:
Only one commission can be paid to each user, IP address, electronic device, home, phone number, billing method, email address. In public environments (eg. Universities, Schools, Dormitories and Office spaces), our decision whether to pay the commission and referral rewards will be based entirely on our discretion after a deposit is made and a bet is successfully placed.
Any attempt to abuse our referral and commission system by bots or multi accounting will be taken seriously and may result in your commission and referral rewards being suspended.
Commissions can be withdrawn into our wallet at anytime.
The system calculates the commission in real time.

faqOne.title: How does the referral system work?
faqOne.content: When you share your referral link with your friends and they sign up at our site; they become your referral and will earn you commission and referral rewards by playing at the 1st.game Alliance.

faqTwo.title: How much can I earn from my referral?
faqTwo.content: You can earn {{percentage}} of their wager activity as commissions + {{amount}} per referral.

faqThree.title: What is the {{amount}} USD reward and how does it work?
faqThree.content: There is a {{amount}} USD reward for each referral you bring to {{gameName}}. This USD reward is given in {{parts}} parts as your referral level goes up from {{level}}.

faqFour.title: I have a big audience. How can I get a special deal?
faqFour.content: If you have a website with good traffic or a social media account with a big audience, you can email us at {{email}}

faqFive.title: How many affiliate links can i create if I have different websites/ social media accounts?
faqFive.content: You can create up to {{codes}} unique codes for different sources of traffic

faqSix.title: Can I see the data of my referral?
faqSix.content: Yes, Transparency, Trust, and Fairness are part of {{gameName}}'s core values. Data like username, total wager and commission earned are all available in the "My Commissions" and "Referral Rewards" tab.

faqSeven.title: Can I share the commission rewards with my referrals?
faqSeven.content: Yes, you can share the commission rewards with your referrals by clicking "create new campaign" and setting the commission split under the "Campaigns" tab.

faqEight.title: What is an indirect referral and what can I earn from them?
faqEight.content: An indirect referral is an active player that comes in from the invite link of one of your direct referrals. If your VIP level is higher than the VIP level of your direct referral, you can also earn commission arising from your indirect referral.
